longestWord

public static java.lang.String longestWord(java.lang.String s)
Returns the longest word in the string (words are separated by spaces) If more than one word is the longest (same length), return the first of the longest words found if null is passed in, the empty string will be returned ("")

removeNonNumbers

public static java.lang.String removeNonNumbers(java.lang.String number)
This takes a string and strips out all the letters, spaces, and punctuation to leave just numbers. If there are no numbers in the string, then the empty string is returned (""). If null is passed in, null is returned.

padChar - the character to pad with

removeAllStartingWith

public static java.lang.String removeAllStartingWith(java.lang.String str,
                                                     java.lang.String substr)
Remove all words (including the delimiter and space) leading up to the space. 
 Delimites '#' (notice the space after the second delimiter string) 
 
 Example String: everything #in here# will be #removed#.
 Result String:  everything will be.

removeAllBetween

public static java.lang.String removeAllBetween(java.lang.String str,
                                                java.lang.String beginStr,
                                                java.lang.String endStr)
Remove all words (including the delimiters) contained between a set of delimiters. 
 Delimiters '#', '# ' (notice the space after the second delimiter string)
 
 Example String: everything #in here# will be #removed#.
 Result String:  everything will be.
